story:
MY STORY

A wise man once said, “There are only two great days in a person’s life -- the day we are born and the day we find out why”. Firmly convinced in my early twenties that I had found the “Why” of my birth as a film producer, I co-founded SRO Entertainment in Germany, the creative supplier for a German film fund. As a result, my company financed and helped produce films directed by Academy Award winners such as Robert Altman (”Company”), Barbara Kopple (”Havoc”), and Robert Towne (”Ask The Dust”), featuring stars the likes of Debra Winger, Donald Sutherland, Zooey Deschanel, Anne Hathaway, Colin Farrell and Selma Hayek.

By 2004, solidly on the path to a successful career in the movie industry, my future plans took an abrupt turn during the shooting of “Ask The Dust” in South Africa, when I went into labor with my first child. A blessed event — eye witnessed no less by Colin Farrell -- one of the stars of the film, which I co-produced with Tom Cruise.

As a consequence, my early years of motherhood left little time for traveling the world in film production.  Especially  after my daughter's arrival was followed by the birth of my eldest son, and  then his identical twin brothers.  One and all the loves of my life, and the inspiration for my song, "Children To Raise", my launch as a singer/songwriter.  An homage to all women struggling between motherhood, and achieving their personal dreams — triggered by my first born's less than subtle suggestion that I forsake my song writing aspirations and "get a real job!"  One that makes money!"

For me, being able to compose, perform, and make a video of "Children to Raise" — while actually doing exactly that — was validation that even when the day comes that the role of a woman's womb is over in this lifetime, her ability to create will still be able to bear\other gifts.  Not just as a musician, or in the arts, but in whatever dream they wish to pursue.  A lesson that no amount of money can buy; an example to pass on to her children and hopefully another nail in the coffin that dictates that women must choose between motherhood and a career.  A daunting task that once chosen, will not only make women stronger, but imbue them with a gift of sight that can only be seen through the maternal lens.  A superpower open to all women, and the title of my new Album.  

A journey to find the connection between personal development of the soul and the concrete results we hope to achieve in this lifetime. The stories and dreams -- the struggles and rewards -- in hindsight and foresight, as I now see them, through the maternal lens.

 

Through The Maternal Lens

The Album I am now asking for your help to produce, at a time when I believe the universe is calling for me to create something meaningful -- not just from the heart, but through the gift of sight I now see the world through. A vision that inspired and empowered me to write over 25 songs this past July. A quest I was only able to achieve by digging deep into my soul to find the authenticity within myself.

 

Use Of Funds

The money contributed will be used to produce the highest quality full length Album, with a minimum of 11 songs -- at a price far below what would be considered an industry norm.  The funds will be allocated towards the studio costs, recording, mastering, producer's fees, engineering, back up vocals, and hiring musicians. 

 

Making & Exceeding My Goals

If I can reach my goal, I’ll be able to produce, master, and release the album “Through The Maternal Lens!” And you will get it before anyone else.  In addition, because of my relationships in the film industry, I will be able to make a music video of one of the songs at no additional costs.

If we exceed the goal, I’ll not only be able to do more with the marketing and promotion of the album, but I will make more music videos. The choice of the first video to make I will decide after getting feedback from all of the donors who made it possible.

Most important of all, I just want others to be able to hear these songs, and these recordings. My goal is to inspire, as much as it is to create and produce.

Risks And Challenges

The lyrics and melodies for most of the songs are already in my head. The first of the songs has already been recorded. As for the remaining elements, I have relationships with seasoned professionals, such as Adam Peri, a brilliant producer/musician with a proven track record for delivering the highest quality results. 

Of course any delays that might be caused by COVID-19, will only effect delivery date, not completion of the album.

Other Ways You Can Help

I'm totally aware that this is not the best of times to ask anyone for financial help.  The strains that COVID has placed on us all makes survival the order of the day.  So I totally understand if you can't chip in for the cost of the album.  That said, if you still feel an urge to help, just make some noise about my campaign.  Spread the word on Indiegogo, Facebook, Twitter, by mouth, e-mail or carrier pigeon.  Anything you can do to help me get this album out, will be greatly appreciated.

story:
About the project:

Musique Noire is an award-winning, woman-led strings and percussion ensemble performing world jazz music.  Formed in 2005, the ensemble has produced two CD projects and one EP project: "Good Hair", an eclectic mix of Latin, jazz, funk, soul and pop, "Holiday Dreams:  A Celebration of Christmas"  a unique take on Christmas favorites, and "Reflections, We Breathe" honoring women warriors of the arts.  

For our fourth release, we want to create a legacy project where we are working with the next generation of incredible musicians.  We have chosen three Detroit-area artists, Alex Way, Ahya Simone and Brendon Davis, who will compose, produce and perform three songs with us.  Each of these artists were chosen not only for their high level of talent, but also because they are committed to social justice causes and making an important impact in their communities.  The members of Musique Noire will also produce three new original tunes.  This new EP release is appropriately entitled *in*ter*gen*er*a*tion*al .  This project will also be the beginning of a larger live work as we will incorporate the songs from this project and our 2017 release, “Reflections:  We Breathe”.  The larger live work will include dance choreography, film and an interactive audience segment.

By contributing to this project, you are helping us to shine a light on younger talent and to assist in their goals of expanding their artistic reach.  It will also inspire other young artists to see what can be possible with the right support.  We will provide music industry support, mentorship and education.  This EP project will be promoted internationally through physical sales and streaming on all of the popular music platforms. 

 

Help Us Get to the "Finish Line"!

Your donations will ensure that we have what we need to complete this important project.  Our goal is $8,000 which will cover recording, mastering, design, manufacturing and musician performance fees.  

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign on your social media, via word of mouth, or any way that you think would get people excited about our project.  The Indiegogo platform makes it easy to share.  Even if you are unable to contribute, just sharing this campaign will make a huge difference!

story:
Hello loves,

My name is Meghan Pulles, and I am an emo-positive singer/songwriter who resides in NYC. I believe that songwriting is cathartic, and music is a deeper way for us all to heal, and overcome past obstacles. My debut album is about healing through emotional abuse, and trauma. Music has really helped me in my life, and I believe it is my sole purpose to share my songs to heal people on this earth from their own traumas and heartache. I love writing songs about all the different emotions that we go through in life, and I can't wait to share them with you. This is a place for you to feel seen, heard, healed, and accepted.

I want the fans to be a part of my album, and my journey with this album. I am currently an unsigned indie artist and your donation would help that dream of mine be realized. 

This album will be a healing space for people to come to, to feel supported, to feel uplifted, and encouraged as they recover through their own healing process. I hope that by sharing my story, I encourage my listeners to realize that they can be empowered to heal too. 

The album will be 13 songs. The producer cost is $2,000 per song, and then Music Video/Marketing/Promotion will be another $5,000. 

 

BREAKDOWN OF ALBUM COSTS:

There are various steps to recording, and releasing an album.

 

1. Pre-Production: This is the beginning of the process where my producer Harper and I take the songs in my head (and in my voice memos), and go over the song-form, structure and arrangement. We want to make these songs the best they can be since the messages behind them are SO important.

2. Recording: This is the middle process when we start the instrumentation behind the music. The songs aren't just singing, and instruments, we want to get the best takes of the song in the instruments, and the vocals. We will take those best takes into the next step which is production, and that is where the magic really happens. 

3. Production: This is the most magical process; this is where the song can really come alive. Using a production software, Harper is able to implement various effects, and added instrumentation to make this song the best song ever. He will also be able to make my vocals come alive in the best way.

3. Mixing & Mastering: This is the last part of the recording process:

 Mixing is essentially making sure the levels of the song are well balanced, and that certain parts show off, or come forward in the right places. 

Mastering is the final piece, and it makes the songs really pop, and come to life bigger than ever.

 

$5-$25 Donation: Personalized thank you card

$25-$100 Donation: Personalized thank you card, Physical copy of Ear Baby album, VIP Access to new content (photos, videos)-i.e. COVER art for album

$100-$400 Donation: Personalized thank you card, Physical copy of Ear Baby album, Personalized Zoom Q+A/Performance 1 hour, VIP Access to new content(photos, videos) -i.e. COVER art for album, VIP Access to new song announcements (hear of new releases before everyone else), Hope tote with signed EP and special customized card

$400-$1,000 Donation: Personalized thank you card, Physical copy of Ear Baby album, Personalized Zoom Q+A/Performance 1 hour, 1 Custom Song Mixed and Mastered, VIP Access to new content(photos, videos) -i.e. COVER art for album, VIP Access to new song announcements (hear of new releases before everyone else),Zoom Listening Party for Album, Hope tote with signed EP and special customized card, Behind the Scenes Access to Music Video

$1,000+ Donation: Personalized thank you card, Physical copy of Ear Baby album, Personalized Zoom Q+A/Performance 1 hour, 1 Custom Song Mixed and Mastered, Private Album Release Party with Meet and Greet (location TBD in NYC), Zoom Listening Party for Album, VIP Access to new content(photos, videos) -i.e. COVER art for album, VIP Access to new song announcements (hear of new releases before everyone else), Hope tote with signed EP and special customized card, Behind the Scenes Access to Music Video


If I don't reach the album fund goal, then I'll only do songs split per single.

The impact is social awareness to healing in the music industry which has been plagued with misogynistic toxicity. I am shining the light on mental health awareness, and self-discovery of healing.

I am a professional indie artist, and I am very confident that I will achieve this goal.

If you are not able to financially give, then you can help me out by sharing this campaign to your network. Tweet it, Facebook it, Instagram it, etc. Anything helps!

story:
Billy Craig has an incredible new album!

Black Swan Theory

His sixth album release and he wants to take it to another level.

So much is involved with releasing an album. Billy is looking to raise funds to promote the album to radio and media in a BIG way. He also wants to manufacture Vinyl and CD's to distribute, along with other merchandise ideas including live concert footage and video content. 

Your contribution is incredibly important and appreciated. It will breathe life into this project and increase effectiveness and awareness to make this album more competitive nationally and globally. 

Billy Craig, "I believe this is my best work, a lot of guitars, a lot of vocals, the songs take you on a ride with a few surprises, so it's a great listen. I'm really excited to get it out and I want to thank everyone for their support, any kind of support at all."

We're looking to raise $15,000 + 

Of course budgets for artists are much higher but our budget goal is to create a platform to release this album in a competitive way. 

We're offering exciting perks for your contributions. Take a look to the right for the contribution tiers. 

 

If you can't contribute, you can still help : )

  • Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.
  • USE the Indiegogo share tools above: Facebook and Twitter icons or click to copy link. 

 

Billy Craig Music

story:
My debut album, Halcyon, is on its way! Help me bring it to life.

I want to record my very first album of original music. Excited to share it with you!

SUMMARY:

My name is Ana Dubyk, I am a musician born in Petroșani, a small town in Romania. Given the uncertainty of the past few months, I want to end this year by working on something that would turn it into a good one. Therefore, I’ve started to plan the recording of my first album – Halcyon. Each song in this album is based on stories about people I have met, about places I have been to and experiences I have had. For example, the first track on this future album, Silence in Petrila. The song also happens to be my first composition and it refers to this mining town, Petrila, that had fallen into serious disrepair. Where most people would have seen nothing but an eyesore, some other people glimpsed the possibility of something brilliant: a cultural center that could turn into a great post-industrial tourist attraction while also bringing residents together. Those few resilient people have so far managed to give birth to a documentary, “Planeta Petrila” (directed by Andrei Dăscălescu), and are struggling to cultivate that sense of community that spans generations. I am one of them - and my debut song, which is part of the documentary soundtrack, tells this story.

I have always known I wanted to be a musician and help my community develop. I studied jazz-pop music composition at the Music University of Bucharest, then I went on to study at The Prince Claus Conservatoire of the Hanze University of Applied Sciences in Groningen, with one semester in New York. I shared the stage with some of the musicians who inspired me and helped me explore the depth and richness of music: Mircea Tiberian, John Betsch, George Dumitriu, Toma Dimitriu, Andrea Caruso, Daniele Nasi, Aleksander Skoric, and many others.

From here, all I need to get my own album off the ground and show Silence in Petrila to the world is a little capital. I believe that change happens when inspiration is shared with everyone - therefore, I turn to you for help.

WHAT I NEED & WHAT YOU GET

Halcyon will have 8 songs (and 2 bonus tracks) that are the embodiment of my experiences as an artist. Every bit of happiness, anger, joy, pain goes into their story, they are deeply powerful and personal. They will be presented in chronological order, from Silence in Petrila to Magic Moon. Rise. All compositions give the musicians the freedom to make their mark and highlight their traits while playing them. Thus, I am happy and thankful that I will be joined in this endeavor by two great musicians and friends: George Dumitriu on guitar and viola, and Andrea Caruso on double-bass. I know they will create the perfect context so that the songs take the best shape possible.

I know that executing this album will come with extra costs for things such as production, mastering, recording, editing, mixing, venue space, marketing, guest artists and more. It all adds up. I am absolutely prepared to invest my money in this beloved project, but I also need some extra help to pull this off in the best way possible – thus, I’ve started an Indiegogo to offset the initial costs of my first album. I am anticipating expenses of about 3000 EUR, so I am setting a goal to raise this exact amount to help bring this special idea to life. 

Here's a general breakdown of the costs:

Recording (Amsterdam): 1200 euro

Traveling costs: 230 euro

Accommodation: 400 euro

Promotion/Perks: 300 euro

CDs: 745 euro

10% unforeseen: 287 euro

Total: 3.162 euro

Of course, there are also some perks lined up for my supporters. EVERYONE who funds the album can take part in a livestream concert I plan to host soon. The following are available for the minimum of these amounts, but if you are willing to offer more, it is much appreciated!

5 EUR – Livestream concert

15 EUR – Halcyon digital download

20 EUR – Halcyon digital download + sticker + postcard + paper bookmark

35 EUR – Halcyon on CD + digital download + postcard + sticker + paper bookmark

50 EUR – CD + bag with artwork by artist Paul Mureșan + postcard + sticker + copper bookmark by Mădălina Luca

100 EUR – Private Vocal Lesson + CD + bag with artwork by artist Paul Mureșan + postcard + sticker + copper bookmark by Mădălina Luca

300 EUR – Private online concert

THE IMPACT

Music can save us in times of crisis.

These past months have been a whirlwind, to say the least. Artists, as so many other categories, have been heavily struck by 2020. I, for one, will remember this year as many things. The year I spent indoors. The year I spent singing online. The year of so many deaths. The year of depression. The year of not knowing.

But we could also remember it as the year of new beginnings. As cities all over the world have shut down to slow the spread of the novel coronavirus, videos of Italians singing from their balconies, policemen in Spain playing guitar and New Yorkers singing along to “Yellow Submarine” from their windows emerged on the internet. People across the globe started making music together and I need to sing along.

I want people who are donating to realize that they have this huge power to impact someone’s life. There’s a part of every one of us that dreams of a better world. Mine is a world where places such as Petrila are saved through creativity and music can be heard even in the most remote corners of the world.

RISKS & CHALLENGES

The biggest risk I face by not meeting my funding goals is not being able to pay my collaborators, at a time when musicians are struggling to find work and survive. A large part of this campaign will go toward paying them, as they agreed to work on this album with no guarantee of when I would be able to pay them.

If I don't meet my funding goals, l will continue to fund this record slowly, with your help and with the generosity and patience of my collaborators.

If the case, any extra money will be donated to I.D. Sîrbu Memorial House in Petrila, the place where I had my first concert almost 10 years ago.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Even if you cannot donate to this campaign, that doesn't mean you can't help!

Spread the word about Halcyon to the people you know who you think would like the album! It's thoughtful for them, and meaningful for me.

Follow, enjoy, and share my posts on Instagram and Facebook: 

Thank you heaps! Sing on!

Love and light,

Ana

story:
Short Summary

Hi!  I'm Scott Whitley - thanks for dropping by.  If we haven't met before, I'm mostly known for my work as a bassist (currently working with 80s band Big Country), YouTube content creator, photographer, bass instructor and audio engineer.

Throughout my career I've been lucky enough to have worked alongside some incredible names including The Animals, Jon Walmsley, Big Country, Richard Jobson, Lind Gail Lewis, Bobby Ball, Steve Cropper, The Casuals and many more. The journey so far, though bumpy at times, has moulded me into the artist I am today - the value of which is immeasurable.

2020 stopped musicians all around the world in our tracks and life on the road was no more.  Although for a while all seemed hopeless, the situation offered me the opportunity to work on finally completing my own solo project - something that'd been on the back burner for around 10 years!

Fast Forward to Feb 2021 and after many months, work is now all but complete on the four recordings for my first ever solo release EP, "In My Shoes". 

The EP features several guest musicians including Christian Madden on keys, Joe Crabtree on drums, Joe Martin & Adam Bidgood on trumpets, Paddy Higginson on sax, Liz Nightingale on baritone sax, Janet Whitley on backing vocals, Chris Lewis on drums, Paul Williams on guitar and of course lil' old me on lead vocals, backing vocals, electric bass, piccolo bass, percussion and additional drums.

I've engineered, mixed and produced the whole thing in house too!

What We Need & What You Get

Now that the recordings are nearly ready, I'm raising funds to make this so much more than a mere digital download, with some very special unique perks for those helping fund the project.

The funds raised will be used for pressing of the physical CD, artwork/design costs for the CD cover, T-shirts/Hats and other merch and for the literature that comes with some of the perks.

Some of the perks will include:

  • A very limited number of exclusive autographed 7" coulored vinyl single pressings
  • Exclusive  autographed Merch including T-Shirts, caps and more
  • Signed copies of the physical CD
  • FLAC file downloads
  • Access to behind the scenes/making-of footage and interviews
  • Your name printed in the CD sleeve
  • Tab/Scores for the bass parts

The Impact

I hope 1st and foremost that you'll really enjoy and cherish your purchase of my EP and of course that's my primary goal.  But the reality is you'll be helping support my family and I throughout these incredibly challenging times and for that I'd like to thank anyone who gets behind this project in whatever way you can - it'll be appreciated more than you could imagine.

Risks & Challenges

With this being my first ever solo release, I've no way of gauging how many people will get behind the campaign.  The huge advantage I have is that I've already self-funded all the recording costs so content already exists.  This means that my target can be set much lower than if I were starting from scratch and having to hire studio time, engineers etc.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't or don't want to purchase the EP but you'd still like to help, please share this page with friends and on your social media - the more people know about it, the more change we have of reaching our goal.

Be sure to use the various share tools here on INDIEGOGO!

Short Summary
Hi!  I'm Scott Whitley - thanks for dropping by.  If we haven't met before, I'm mostly known for my work as a bassist (currently working with 80s band Big Country), YouTube content creator, photographer, bass instructor and audio engineer.
Throughout my career I've been lucky enough to have worked alongside some incredible names including The Animals, Jon Walmsley, Big Country, Richard Jobson, Lind Gail Lewis, Bobby Ball, Steve Cropper, The Casuals and many more. The journey so far, though bumpy at times, has moulded me into the artist I am today - the value of which is immeasurable.
2020 stopped musicians all around the world in our tracks and life on the road was no more.  Although for a while all seemed hopeless, the situation offered me the opportunity to work on finally completing my own solo project - something that'd been on the back burner for around 10 years!
Fast Forward to Feb 2021 and after many months, work is now all but complete on the four recordings for my first ever solo release EP, "In My Shoes". 
The EP features several guest musicians including Christian Madden on keys, Joe Crabtree on drums, Joe Martin & Adam Bidgood on trumpets, Paddy Higginson on sax, Liz Nightingale on baritone sax, Janet Whitley on backing vocals, Chris Lewis on drums, Paul Williams on guitar and of course lil' old me on lead vocals, backing vocals, electric bass, piccolo bass, percussion and additional drums.
I've engineered, mixed and produced the whole thing in house too!

What We Need & What You Get
Now that the recordings are nearly ready, I'm raising funds to make this so much more than a mere digital download, with some very special unique perks for those helping fund the project.
The funds raised will be used for pressing of the physical CD, artwork/design costs for the CD cover, T-shirts/Hats and other merch and for the literature that comes with some of the perks.
Some of the perks will include:

A very limited number of exclusive autographed 7" coulored vinyl single pressings
Exclusive  autographed Merch including T-Shirts, caps and more
Signed copies of the physical CD
FLAC file downloads
Access to behind the scenes/making-of footage and interviews
Your name printed in the CD sleeve
Tab/Scores for the bass parts


The Impact
I hope 1st and foremost that you'll really enjoy and cherish your purchase of my EP and of course that's my primary goal.  But the reality is you'll be helping support my family and I throughout these incredibly challenging times and for that I'd like to thank anyone who gets behind this project in whatever way you can - it'll be appreciated more than you could imagine.

Risks & Challenges
With this being my first ever solo release, I've no way of gauging how many people will get behind the campaign.  The huge advantage I have is that I've already self-funded all the recording costs so content already exists.  This means that my target can be set much lower than if I were starting from scratch and having to hire studio time, engineers etc.

Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you can't or don't want to purchase the EP but you'd still like to help, please share this page with friends and on your social media - the more people know about it, the more change we have of reaching our goal.Be sure to use the various share tools here on INDIEGOGO!

story:
~~ em PORTUGUÊS mais a baixo ~~~ en CASTELLANO mas abajo ~~~ in ENGLISH here ~~

“Mariana’s pristine voice and rapturous melodies create a panoramic offering to honor our most primal element: water.  In each song, you will feel her authentic service to the sacred and to the Earth, and be drawn into the sweetness and strength of these timeless prayers.  This music is a cleansing force for heart and soul.”  ~Tina Malia

“Mariana es hermana de corazón y rezo compartido. Es un honor ser testigo de su artesanía, de la integridad con la que camina su rezo y su canto al servicio de la vida. Agradezco su voz en mi vida. La siento delicada y enraizada, femenina, tierra. Me trasmite cuido, belleza y coherencia. Su vibración abre tiempo y espacio sagrado con el que resueno y habito. Todas las bendiciones y apoyo para tu nueva creación, Mariana.” ~ Paloma Todd , Luna de Abril

 

ARAMARA

((ENGLISH))

This Album is a Water Prayer in the form of Songs.  

A journey through the dimensions of Water, and the subtleness of the Voice.

The Water of Life, that inspires us and gives us songs,

is the main character, the power spirt in command here in our Blue Planet and in this work too.

This work is focused on the Voice as an Instrument and its layers.

Some songs are simple and you can add your voice too.

So that together, we sing to the Water.

Songs that you can carry with you, to your favorite Water places, as an offering.

“AraMarA” is a tool to support and guide the connection with the Spirt of the Water, giver of life, from which the Water that lives within us is part of.

“AraMarA” is also fruit of this time, in which we had to slow down, that is making us look within, focus on the present and on simplicity. In which our daily practices, our relationship with what is sacred, and creativity are very grounding.

“AraMarA ~ Voz d’Água”* is a light dot in the starry blanket, a guide in this new era that is arriving, the new dawn. 

I’ve been carrying some of these songs for a while, and in February of last year, right after “Shakti Sound”**, I recorded the main vocals of some songs in studio, when Tina Malia proposed to help co-produce this dream of a 3rd Album. Then, during the rest of the year 2020 several new songs came down and joined this boat. 

Now, almost a solar year after, and after a lot of care, watering, international collaborations, “AraMara” is almost ready… for the final mixes, to be mastered, to be printed, and then to go out in to the World, to sail into the 4 winds.

This Crowdfunding is a way of calling in for the support,

for this Independent Production.

To help pay the costs:

~the studio hours,

~the hardware and software, 

~the co-production and the final mixes,

~the master, 

~the printing, 

~to give thanks to the musicians, 

~the graphic work 

~and more…

 

The elders say the Creator feeds from our Creativity.

Let us keep supporting each other.

So that we can keep going, growing, believing, creating, breathing fresh air without barriers, gather around the Sacred Fire, drinking alive+clean+free Water, so we can take care of this Earth that holds space for us, able to walk in beauty, in freedom.

Grateful,

Blessings in your way,

Mariana Cortesão

 

Guests healers ~ musicians : 

 Ivan Looking Horse, Heather Christie, Katari, Diego Peres de Nation Ekeko, Lautaro Zambala, Prem Jitrendra, Gillem Oms, Nataniel Melo, Vir Macoy and Evan Frazer.

With the loving help of co-producer, muse, and supporter Tina Malia.

To be mastered with Jordi Navarro in “The Room BCN”.

Artwork in process :  Rocco Tyndale (Subtempo), Mariana Serra  & Mariana Cortesão

CF launch support  : Gabriela Gonçalves, Chechu Garcia + Jaime Abascal.

 

About me, Mariana Cortesão : agualume.com

my music : FB , BANDCAMP , SOUND CLOUD , SPOTIFY , YouTube , ...

About the name of the Album:

I heard it being whispered to me:  AraMara ~Voz d’Água *

To the Wixarika people Tatei Haramara “our Mother, the Ocean” is the source of all life, and also the origin of all the waters in the world. A way of naming the water deity that, for them, sits in the West.

It is a palindrome, with many words inside, Ar (air), Ara (ahora), Amar (to love), Mar (the sea, the ocean), Mara/Ma/Ama (mother), Rama (brunch of the Tree of Life, and a sacred Bhakti sound in India)…  it has 7 letters, the 7 waves of a set in the sea, the 7 directions of the universe, 7 colours of the rainbow, same number of letters of the name I carry.

* “voz d’agua” translated: water voice /voice of the water. **a gathering to empower women in  the “music industry”.

ALBUM COSTS : Rough Numbers:

Studio hours, coProduction, final Mixes, and Master 3000e

Art work and Printing: 1000 ~ 2000e

Hardware + Software ( Abelton, Logic, etc)  > 1000e

Musicians 500 ~ 1000e

Indigogo commissions + 4% if CF reaches goal or 9% if CF does not reach the goal.

Total approx:  5500 ~7000

 

Ways on How YOU CAN HELP :

~  Pre-order ARAMARA now for however much you wish to contribute by selecting one of the perks listed here.

( If you are unable to Pre-order at this time, You can still help in several  important ways )

~ Share this CrowdFund campaign ~ Word of mouth and  through social media :  FaceBook/instagram/Telegram/Whatapp etc…

~ Email your friends and family (this system works the best).

~ Generally spreading the word! 

 

IMPORTANT NOTE ABOUT PAYMENTS : PAYPAL ,  MBWAY or HERE

 - If you wish to pay using PayPal you can also pay directly to  PayPal.me/marianacortesao

 -   you can also use MBWAY :  964781518  ~ for the People in PORTUGAL 

 ( ;  and PLEASE tell me WHICH PERK  you have chosen, so I can keep the right track ; )

- Indigogo charges a comission from every donation

<3 

Eco-facts:

The Album Artwork will be plastic free and will be printed with eco inks on Recycled Paper.

If I reach the final goal  I’ll dedicate a % to an Water/Ocean Protection/Awareness Project to be done in “Sacred Water Voices”

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

ARAMARA

(( PORTUGUÊS ))

Este album é um Rezo à Água em forma de Canto.

Uma viajem às dimensões da Água e aos matizes da Voz.

A Água de Vida que nos inspira e nos oferece os seus cantos, 

é a protagonista, Espírito de Poder no comando aqui no planeta Azul e neste trabalho.

É um trabalho muito focado na Voz como instrumento.

Alguns são cantos muito simples, aos quais poderás somar a tua voz.

Para que juntos, cantemos à Água. 

Cantos que podes levar contigo, a lugares favoritos de Água, como uma Oferenda.

Uma ferramenta para apoiar e guiar a conexão com esse espírito da Água, dador(a) de vida, do qual a Água que vive dentro de nós faz parte.

“AraMarA” é também fruto deste tempo em que nos desaceleramos e que nos está a fazer olhar dentro, focar-nos no simples e no presente. Em que as práticas diárias, a nossa relação com o que é sagrado e a criatividade são uma âncora.

“AraMarA ~Voz d’Água”, é mais um pontinho de Luz no manto estrelado, uma guia ao novo tempo que está a chegar, ao novo amanhecer.

Alguns de estes Cantos já chegaram há algum tempo, e em Fevereiro do ano passado, logo a seguir do “Shakti Sound”, comecei a gravar  as bases de alguns Cantos em estúdio, quando Tina Malia me propôs co-produzir este sonho de lançar um 3º album.  Depois, durante o resto do ano de 2020, vários cantos novos foram chegando e juntaram-se neste barquinho.

Agora quase um ciclo solar depois, de muito mimo, rega, colaborações internacionais, “AraMarA “ já está quase pronto… para as misturas finais, ser masterizado, ser impresso e logo sair ao mundo, para navegar os 4 rumos. 

Este CrowdFunding é uma maneira de fazer uma chamada, para o Apoio 

desta Produção Musical Independente, e ajudar com os vários custos que lhe são adjacentes: 

as horas de gravação em estúdio,

~ hardware, software de edição, 

~a co-produção e os mixes finais, 

~o master, 

~a impressão dos Albums, 

~recompensar @s músic@s, 

~o trabalho gráfico

~e mais.

 

Dizem que o/a Criador(a) se nutre da nossa Criatividade.

Apoiemo-nos un@s aos otr@s.

Para que posámos sempre continuar a crescer, a acreditar e a criar.

Respirando Ar puro, sem barreiras, reunir-nos à volta do Fogo Sagrado, bebendo Água viva+limpa+livre, cuidar bem desta Terra que nos cuida e, em liberdade, caminhar em beleza.

Grata, 

Bom caminho,

Mariana Cortesão

 

Convidad@s, Music@s e Curandeir@s:

Ivan Looking Horse, Heather Christie, Katari, Nation Ekeko, Lautaro Zambala, Prem Jitrendra, Gillem Oms, Nataniel Melo, Vir Macoy+ Evan Frazer…

Com a ajuda amorosa da co-productora e musa: Tina Malia.

E a masterizar com Jordi Navarro no “The Room Bcn”.

Artwork em processo :  Rocco Tyndale (Subtempo), Mariana Serra  + Mariana Cortesão

Apoio no lanzamiento do CF : Gabriela Gonçalves, Chechu Garcia + Jaime Abascal.

 

Sobre mim, Mariana Cortesão : agualume.com

a minha  musica : FB , BANDCAMP , SOUND CLOUD , SPOTIFY , YouTube , ...

Sobre o nome do Album :

Sussurraram-me : AraMara ~ Voz d´Água.

Para o povo Wixarika Tatei Haramara “A Nossa Mãe, o Mar”, é fonte de toda a vida e  também é a origem de todas as águas do Mundo. Maneira de nomear a deidade do Mar, que na sua cosmovisão, vive no poente.

É uma palavra capicua, com muitas palavras dentro, ali vive o Ar (o vento/o canto), Ara ( agora ), o verbo Amar, o Mar, Mara/Mah/Ama ( mãe ), Rama ( deidade e sonoridade sagrada na India / “ramo”)… tem 7 letras como o set das ondas do Mar, as 7 direções do universo, as 7cores do arco-íris, e como o nome que me deram.

*um encuentro na Costa Rica, de empoderamiento das mulheres na industria musical.


CUSTOS DO ALBUM : 

Horas de Estudio, Co-Produção, Mixes finais e  Master 3000e

Art work e Impressão : 1000 ~ 2000e

Hardware + Software ( Abelton, Logic, etc)  > 1000e

Music@s 500 ~ 1000e

Comissões Indigogo + 4% se o CF alcançar o objetivo ou 9% se não.

Total aproximado:  5500 ~7000


MANEIRAS DE APOIAR :

~  Pre-comprar ARAMARA selecionando uma das opções aqui a direita.

~ Partilhar esta campanha de CrowdFunding : boca a boca e pelos meios sociais digitais:  FaceBook/instagram/Telegram/Whatapp etc…

~ mandar Emails a contactos seus , esta maneira é um grande apoio.

~ Espalhar a Noticia.

 Grata  <3

NOTA  IMPORTANTE  SOBRE AS CONTRIBUIÇÕES : PAYPAL ,  MBWAY e  AQUI

 - Se quiser usar  PayPal pode pagar directamente em  PayPal.me/marianacortesao

 - As pessoas em  PORTUGAL  podem directamente usar  MBWAY :  964781518

 Deixem me saber, por favor,  qual “ perk” escolheram para que lhes siga o rastro ; )

- Indigogo cobra uma % por cada  contribuição 

 

Eco-factos:

~O Album Fisico será livre de plástico e será impresso em papel reciclado com tintas ecológicas.

~Se conseguir alcançar o objetivo monetário dedicarei uma % a um Projecto de proteção/eco- consciencialização dos Mares/da Agua , a ser feito em “Sacred Water Voices”

 

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

ARAMARA 

(( CASTELLANO ))

Este Álbum es un Rezo al Agua en forma de Cantos.

Um viaje a las dimensiones del Agua y a los matices de la Voz.

El Agua de Vida que inspira y nos regala sus cantos, 

es la protagonista, el espíritu poder al mando aqui en el  Planeta Azul y en este trabajo.

Un trabajo enfocado en el instrumento de la Voz y sus desdoblamientos.

Algunos son cantos muy simples, a los cuales podrás sumar tu voz.

Para junt@s, cantarle al Água. 

Cantos que puedes llevar contigo y tu familia, como una Ofrenda, a tus lugares favoritos de Agua. Una herramienta para apoyar y guiar la conexión con ese espiritu, dador(a) de vida, de lo qual el Água que vive dentro de nosotr@s hace parte.

“AraMarA” es también fruto de este tiempo en que nos hemos ralentizado y que nos está haciendo mirar hacia dentro, enfocar en el sencillo y en el presente. En que las prácticas diarias, nuestra relación con lo que es sagrado y la creatividad son uma ancla.

“AraMarA ~ Voz d’Água”*, es un puntito de luz más en el manto estrellado, una guía al nuevo tiempo que está llegando, al nuevo amanecer.

Algunos de estos Cantos ya han llegado hace algún tiempo,

y en Febrero del año pasado, seguido de “Shakti Sound”**, empecé a gravar las bases de algunos Cantos en estudio, cuando Tina Malia me propuso co-producir este sueño de un 3er Album. Después, durante el resto del ano de 2020, varios cantos nuevos han ido bajando y se han unido a este barquito.

Ahora casi un ciclo solar después, y después de mucho cuido, riego, colaboraciones internacionales, “AraMarA “ ya esta casi preparado… para las mezclas finales,  masterizar, ser impresso y salir al mundo a navegar los 4 rumbos. 

Este CrowdFunding es una maneira de llamar al Apoyo 

de esta Production Independiente, y ayudar com los varios costes: 

~las horas de grabaciones en estudio, 

~hardware, 

~software de edición,

~la co-production en los mixes finales, 

~el master, 

~la impresión de los Albums, 

~recompensar los músicos, 

el trabajo gráfico y mas…

 

Dicen l@s abuel@s , que el/la Creador(a) se nutre de nuestra Creatividad.

Apoyémonos un@s a los otr@s.

Para que siempre podamos seguir crescendo, creyendo, creando,

respirando Aire puro, sin barreras, reunirnos alrededor de un Fuego Sagrado, bebiendo Água viva+limpia+libre, y cuidar bien de esta Tierra que nos cuida, para en libertad caminar el belleza.

 

En Gratitud, 

Buen camino,

Mariana Cortesão

 

Invitad@s, music@s y curander@s:

Ivan Looking Horse, Heather Cristy, Katari, Diego Peres/ Nation Ekeko, Lautaro Zambala, Prem Jitrendra, Gillem Oms, Nataniel Melo, Vir Macoy + Evan Frazer…

Com la ayuda de la co-productora y musa Tina Malia.

E a masterizar en “The Room Bcn” con Jordi Navarro.

Artwork  en processo :  Rocco Tyndale (Subtempo), Mariana Serra  + Mariana Cortesão

Apoyo al lanzamiento del CF  : Gabriela Gonsalves, Chechu Garcia + Jaime Abascal.

 

Sobre mi, Mariana Cortesão : agualume.com

mi musica : FB , BANDCAMP , SOUND CLOUD , SPOTIFY , YouTube , ...

Sobre el nombre del Album :

Asi me lo han sussurrado : AraMara ~ Voz d´Água *

Según  el pueblo Wixarika Tatei Haramara “Nuestra Madre, el Mar”, es fuente de toda vida, en cuanto también es origen de las aguas del mundo. Manera de nombrar a la deidade del Mar, que en su cosmo vision, vive en el poniente.

Es una palavra capicua, con muchas palabras dentro, allí vive el Ar (“aire”/viento/ canto), Ara (ahora), el verbo Amar, el Mar, Mara/Ma/Ama (madre), Rama (parte del árbol de la vida y  sonido sagrado en la India)… tiene 7 letras como el set de olas del mar, las 7 direciones de este universo, los 7colores do arco iris y como el nombre que llevo.

*“voz d´água” , traduzido seria: voz de agua / voz del água.**un encuentro en Costa Rica, de empoderamiento de las mujeres en la industria musical.

 

COSTES DEL ALBUM: 

Horas de estudio, CoProduction, Mixes finales y Master 3000e

Art work y Impression: 1000 ~ 2000e

Hardware + Software ( Abelton, Logic, etc)  > 1000e

Music@s 500 ~ 1000e

Indigogo : Commissiones  + 4% se el  CF cubre el objectivo o 9% si no.

Total approximado:  5500 ~7000

 

MANERAS de como se puede APOYAR :

~  Pre-comprar ARAMARA com lo que puedas contribuir selecionando em la lista aqui.

Y /o

~ Partilhar esta campaña de CrowdFund! Boca a boca y/o en los medios sociales digitales :  FaceBook/instagram/Telegram/Whatapp etc…

~ Mandar Emails a tus amigos es una optima manera tambien ;)

<3  Gracias !

NOTA  IMPORTANTE SOBRE LOS PAGAMIENTOS : PAYPAL o  AQUI

 -Se usas PayPal puedes tambien hacerlo directamente en PayPal.me/marianacortesao 

( (pero pff dime que has elegido para que pueda seguir el rastro ))

- Indigogo cobra un % de cada aportación.

 

Eco-hechos:

El Album será libre de plástico y será impresso em papel reciclado , com tintas ecológicas.

Se logro alcanzar el objetivo dedicaré un %  a un Proyecto de Protección/Eco-Concientización del Agua /de los Mares a hacer en “Sacred Water Voices“

)- Indigogo charges a comission from every donation<3 Eco-facts:The Album Artwork will be plastic free and will be printed with eco inks on Recycled Paper.If I reach the final goal  I’ll dedicate a % to an Water/Ocean Protection/Awareness Project to be done in “Sacred Water Voices”~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ARAMARA(( PORTUGUÊS ))Este album é um Rezo à Água em forma de Canto.Uma viajem às dimensões da Água e aos matizes da Voz.A Água de Vida que nos inspira e nos oferece os seus cantos, é a protagonista, Espírito de Poder no comando aqui no planeta Azul e neste trabalho.É um trabalho muito focado na Voz como instrumento.Alguns são cantos muito simples, aos quais poderás somar a tua voz.Para que juntos, cantemos à Água. Cantos que podes levar contigo, a lugares favoritos de Água, como uma Oferenda.Uma ferramenta para apoiar e guiar a conexão com esse espírito da Água, dador(a) de vida, do qual a Água que vive dentro de nós faz parte.“AraMarA” é também fruto deste tempo em que nos desaceleramos e que nos está a fazer olhar dentro, focar-nos no simples e no presente. Em que as práticas diárias, a nossa relação com o que é sagrado e a criatividade são uma âncora.“AraMarA ~Voz d’Água”, é mais um pontinho de Luz no manto estrelado, uma guia ao novo tempo que está a chegar, ao novo amanhecer.Alguns de estes Cantos já chegaram há algum tempo, e em Fevereiro do ano passado, logo a seguir do “Shakti Sound”, comecei a gravar  as bases de alguns Cantos em estúdio, quando Tina Malia me propôs co-produzir este sonho de lançar um 3º album.  Depois, durante o resto do ano de 2020, vários cantos novos foram chegando e juntaram-se neste barquinho.Agora quase um ciclo solar depois, de muito mimo, rega, colaborações internacionais, “AraMarA “ já está quase pronto… para as misturas finais, ser masterizado, ser impresso e logo sair ao mundo, para navegar os 4 rumos. Este CrowdFunding é uma maneira de fazer uma chamada, para o Apoio desta Produção Musical Independente, e ajudar com os vários custos que lhe são adjacentes: as horas de gravação em estúdio,~ hardware, software de edição, ~a co-produção e os mixes finais, ~o master, ~a impressão dos Albums, ~recompensar @s músic@s, ~o trabalho gráfico~e mais. Dizem que o/a Criador(a) se nutre da nossa Criatividade.Apoiemo-nos un@s aos otr@s.Para que posámos sempre continuar a crescer, a acreditar e a criar.Respirando Ar puro, sem barreiras, reunir-nos à volta do Fogo Sagrado, bebendo Água viva+limpa+livre, cuidar bem desta Terra que nos cuida e, em liberdade, caminhar em beleza.Grata, Bom caminho,Mariana Cortesão Convidad@s, Music@s e Curandeir@s:Ivan Looking Horse, Heather Christie, Katari, Nation Ekeko, Lautaro Zambala, Prem Jitrendra, Gillem Oms, Nataniel Melo, Vir Macoy+ Evan Frazer…Com a ajuda amorosa da co-productora e musa: Tina Malia.E a masterizar com Jordi Navarro no “The Room Bcn”.Artwork em processo :  Rocco Tyndale (Subtempo), Mariana Serra  + Mariana CortesãoApoio no lanzamiento do CF : Gabriela Gonçalves, Chechu Garcia + Jaime Abascal. Sobre mim, Mariana Cortesão : agualume.coma minha  musica : FB , BANDCAMP , SOUND CLOUD , SPOTIFY , YouTube , ...Sobre o nome do Album :Sussurraram-me : AraMara ~ Voz d´Água.Para o povo Wixarika Tatei Haramara “A Nossa Mãe, o Mar”, é fonte de toda a vida e  também é a origem de todas as águas do Mundo. Maneira de nomear a deidade do Mar, que na sua cosmovisão, vive no poente.É uma palavra capicua, com muitas palavras dentro, ali vive o Ar (o vento/o canto), Ara ( agora ), o verbo Amar, o Mar, Mara/Mah/Ama ( mãe ), Rama ( deidade e sonoridade sagrada na India / “ramo”)… tem 7 letras como o set das ondas do Mar, as 7 direções do universo, as 7cores do arco-íris, e como o nome que me deram.*um encuentro na Costa Rica, de empoderamiento das mulheres na industria musical.CUSTOS DO ALBUM : Horas de Estudio, Co-Produção, Mixes finais e  Master 3000eArt work e Impressão : 1000 ~ 2000eHardware + Software ( Abelton, Logic, etc)  > 1000eMusic@s 500 ~ 1000eComissões Indigogo + 4% se o CF alcançar o objetivo ou 9% se não.Total aproximado:  5500 ~7000MANEIRAS DE APOIAR :~  Pre-comprar ARAMARA selecionando uma das opções aqui a direita.~ Partilhar esta campanha de CrowdFunding : boca a boca e pelos meios sociais digitais:  FaceBook/instagram/Telegram/Whatapp etc…~ mandar Emails a contactos seus , esta maneira é um grande apoio.~ Espalhar a Noticia. Grata  <3NOTA  IMPORTANTE  SOBRE AS CONTRIBUIÇÕES : PAYPAL ,  MBWAY e  AQUI - Se quiser usar  PayPal pode pagar directamente em  PayPal.me/marianacortesao - As pessoas em  PORTUGAL  podem directamente usar  MBWAY :  964781518 Deixem me saber, por favor,  qual “ perk” escolheram para que lhes siga o rastro ; )- Indigogo cobra uma % por cada  contribuição  Eco-factos:~O Album Fisico será livre de plástico e será impresso em papel reciclado com tintas ecológicas.~Se conseguir alcançar o objetivo monetário dedicarei uma % a um Projecto de proteção/eco- consciencialização dos Mares/da Agua , a ser feito em “Sacred Water Voices” ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ARAMARA (( CASTELLANO ))Este Álbum es un Rezo al Agua en forma de Cantos.Um viaje a las dimensiones del Agua y a los matices de la Voz.El Agua de Vida que inspira y nos regala sus cantos, es la protagonista, el espíritu poder al mando aqui en el  Planeta Azul y en este trabajo.Un trabajo enfocado en el instrumento de la Voz y sus desdoblamientos.Algunos son cantos muy simples, a los cuales podrás sumar tu voz.Para junt@s, cantarle al Água. Cantos que puedes llevar contigo y tu familia, como una Ofrenda, a tus lugares favoritos de Agua. Una herramienta para apoyar y guiar la conexión con ese espiritu, dador(a) de vida, de lo qual el Água que vive dentro de nosotr@s hace parte.“AraMarA” es también fruto de este tiempo en que nos hemos ralentizado y que nos está haciendo mirar hacia dentro, enfocar en el sencillo y en el presente. En que las prácticas diarias, nuestra relación con lo que es sagrado y la creatividad son uma ancla.“AraMarA ~ Voz d’Água”*, es un puntito de luz más en el manto estrellado, una guía al nuevo tiempo que está llegando, al nuevo amanecer.Algunos de estos Cantos ya han llegado hace algún tiempo,y en Febrero del año pasado, seguido de “Shakti Sound”**, empecé a gravar las bases de algunos Cantos en estudio, cuando Tina Malia me propuso co-producir este sueño de un 3er Album. Después, durante el resto del ano de 2020, varios cantos nuevos han ido bajando y se han unido a este barquito.Ahora casi un ciclo solar después, y después de mucho cuido, riego, colaboraciones internacionales, “AraMarA “ ya esta casi preparado… para las mezclas finales,  masterizar, ser impresso y salir al mundo a navegar los 4 rumbos. Este CrowdFunding es una maneira de llamar al Apoyo de esta Production Independiente, y ayudar com los varios costes: ~las horas de grabaciones en estudio, ~hardware, ~software de edición,~la co-production en los mixes finales, ~el master, ~la impresión de los Albums, ~recompensar los músicos, el trabajo gráfico y mas… Dicen l@s abuel@s , que el/la Creador(a) se nutre de nuestra Creatividad.Apoyémonos un@s a los otr@s.Para que siempre podamos seguir crescendo, creyendo, creando,respirando Aire puro, sin barreras, reunirnos alrededor de un Fuego Sagrado, bebiendo Água viva+limpia+libre, y cuidar bien de esta Tierra que nos cuida, para en libertad caminar el belleza. En Gratitud, Buen camino,Mariana Cortesão Invitad@s, music@s y curander@s:Ivan Looking Horse, Heather Cristy, Katari, Diego Peres/ Nation Ekeko, Lautaro Zambala, Prem Jitrendra, Gillem Oms, Nataniel Melo, Vir Macoy + Evan Frazer…Com la ayuda de la co-productora y musa Tina Malia.E a masterizar en “The Room Bcn” con Jordi Navarro.Artwork  en processo :  Rocco Tyndale (Subtempo), Mariana Serra  + Mariana CortesãoApoyo al lanzamiento del CF  : Gabriela Gonsalves, Chechu Garcia + Jaime Abascal. Sobre mi, Mariana Cortesão : agualume.commi musica : FB , BANDCAMP , SOUND CLOUD , SPOTIFY , YouTube , ...Sobre el nombre del Album :Asi me lo han sussurrado : AraMara ~ Voz d´Água *Según  el pueblo Wixarika Tatei Haramara “Nuestra Madre, el Mar”, es fuente de toda vida, en cuanto también es origen de las aguas del mundo. Manera de nombrar a la deidade del Mar, que en su cosmo vision, vive en el poniente.Es una palavra capicua, con muchas palabras dentro, allí vive el Ar (“aire”/viento/ canto), Ara (ahora), el verbo Amar, el Mar, Mara/Ma/Ama (madre), Rama (parte del árbol de la vida y  sonido sagrado en la India)… tiene 7 letras como el set de olas del mar, las 7 direciones de este universo, los 7colores do arco iris y como el nombre que llevo.*“voz d´água” , traduzido seria: voz de agua / voz del água.**un encuentro en Costa Rica, de empoderamiento de las mujeres en la industria musical. COSTES DEL ALBUM: Horas de estudio, CoProduction, Mixes finales y Master 3000eArt work y Impression: 1000 ~ 2000eHardware + Software ( Abelton, Logic, etc)  > 1000eMusic@s 500 ~ 1000eIndigogo : Commissiones  + 4% se el  CF cubre el objectivo o 9% si no.Total approximado:  5500 ~7000 MANERAS de como se puede APOYAR :~  Pre-comprar ARAMARA com lo que puedas contribuir selecionando em la lista aqui.Y /o~ Partilhar esta campaña de CrowdFund! Boca a boca y/o en los medios sociales digitales :  FaceBook/instagram/Telegram/Whatapp etc…~ Mandar Emails a tus amigos es una optima manera tambien ;)<3  Gracias !NOTA  IMPORTANTE SOBRE LOS PAGAMIENTOS : PAYPAL o  AQUI -Se usas PayPal puedes tambien hacerlo directamente en PayPal.me/marianacortesao ( (pero pff dime que has elegido para que pueda seguir el rastro ))- Indigogo cobra un % de cada aportación. Eco-hechos:El Album será libre de plástico y será impresso em papel reciclado , com tintas ecológicas.Se logro alcanzar el objetivo dedicaré un %  a un Proyecto de Protección/Eco-Concientización del Agua /de los Mares a hacer en “Sacred Water Voices“~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

story:
WHO WE ARE

Funkee Tung started out in late 2019, initially as a cover band playing funk and soul classics. Over time, the transient nature of Hong Kong meant that the lineup changed regularly, but by September 2020 we had a tight core group and made a promise to ourselves to devote more attention to our originals. Since then, we’ve played Hong Kong harbour twice, released a single and music video, appeared on RTHK radio and performed at Rula Live, The Wanch, Rio and The Aftermath Bar, as well as live streaming gigs for Music Hotpot and Innonation.

We’re a group of seven including Alan Francis (vocals, guitar), Alec Anderson (guitar), Daniel Cabane (alto sax), Vojta Havrda (tenor sax), Noriko Watanabe (bass), Sean Gu (keys) and William Chapman (percussion). Our influences include funk, soul, britpop, swing jazz and hard rock to name just a few genres.

WHAT WE NEED

We are looking for HKD20,000 to record our song "Roaring 20s" with legendary Hong Kong producer John Laudon, who has done work with Hong Kong superstars such as Alan Tam, Eason Chen and Jacky Cheung. He even has a Wikipedia page! The all-inclusive fee covers unlimited time recording, mixing, mastering, producing and arranging the song, which we feel deserves special treatment by a truly established pro. If we are able to exceed this amount, we will look to fund a music video which will cost approximately HKD10,000.

We may not be a cantopop act (though who knows the future), but John Laudon’s personal interest in the funk, soul and rock n roll that makes us tick is why we chose him. The song below that Laudon produced in particular won us over. Our live shows have been a hit, but we’re missing that expertise in the studio that will help us to truly realise our vision for the song. 


We’ll be funding the artwork, marketing and launch party ourselves for the single, so we’re definitely doing our part too. Earlier in the year we self funded a single and music video for “(Let’s Do) The Lockdown”, so let it not be said that we don’t get things done. That video has racked up over 1000 views by now.

 

THE SONG

Roaring 20s is a fusion of rock and 1920s swing with infectious descending bass lines and saucy sax from our very own Daniel Cabane. The lyrics speak of making the most of your 20s and a nostalgic reflection of the past, with a chorus that could be belted by a large group of drunks at Oktoberfest. Every band member contributes to the arrangement, adding a level of complexity that is interesting, worth multiple listens and delicate to manage in the studio.


You can listen to a live version of the track when we performed it at The Grounds by Hong Kong habour here - https://soundcloud.com/funkeetung/roaring-20s?in=funkeetung/sets/live-at-the-grounds

WHAT YOU GET

HKD100 - You get to hear the finished song before it's released

HKD250 - Guaranteed entry to our launch party

HKD500 - Personalized video for friends and family a la Cameo

HKD750 - Signed limited edition Funkee Tung tote bag

HKD1000- Appearance in our MV and name credited in the single notes

TESTIMONIALS

“Too perfect” - Cyril Ma

“Swing rock troupe Funkee Tung kicked Funk Ska Nation off with a hell of a bang” - Jasmine Gould-Wilson

"Roaring 20s is a catchy song that sticks in your head and creates nostalgia whilst still sounding new and fresh" - Mark Francis

IMPACT

We really believe in the potential of this song and feel it has broad appeal. This isn’t just because it’s a catchy tune with a cool groove, but because it fuses rock and swing in a unique way and covers themes which are relatable to anyone. Whether you are just getting older or excited for the decade ahead, the song is both nostalgic and a zeitgeist for the coming decade. The sax lines are really at the core of Roaring 20s and it's an instrument that everyone loves, but rarely gets to shine as it does here. Should the single gain some traction, we hope to follow it up with a gatsby-esque music video and to use it to get high profile local gigs like the Rugby 7s / Clockenflap, as well as getting into regional music festivals.

DEADLINES & COMPLETION

We want to close the funding round by the end of August so we can immediately plan the production with Laudon and get the rhythm section laid down in early September. Vojta will be overseas, but he’ll be back at the end of September to record his parts, which come towards the end, so that we can have the song fully recorded, mixed and mastered by early-mid October. After that, it’s about planning the single for a November / December release with a launch party to reward everyone for their contributions

RISK & CHALLENGES

We need to get this song really tight as the arrangement requires it more than other tracks, so we will need to have many practice sessions to ensure we can play it to a metronome. Luckily, our rhythm section has had some time to gel, so we will nail it with practice. There are also unforeseen delays to recording but we have tried to factor this into the timeline, and Laudon’s experience will ensure this is well managed. 

HOW ELSE CAN YOU HELP?

The pandemic has hit everyone hard, so if you aren’t able to help financially there are some alternative options below

  • Share this campaign! Not only sharing the link, but by tagging a friend, bringing it up in conversation and letting people know - spread the word!
  • Check out and follow our social media on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Soundcloud and YouTube
  • Come to our upcoming gigs at Rio on 31st July and The Aftermath Bar on the 13th of August.
  • Consider checking out our Linktree https://linktr.ee/funkeetung

story:
welcome to the purelands...!

My name is Marcie and I am the artist behind this sacred music project. I am a singer, composer, and multi-instrumentalist -- and also a meditator, seeker of truth, and healer.

***When you donate or order your copy of the album 'Into the Light' today, within a few days time, you will receive your unique download link(s) via email <3 ***

***If you have purchased the album with a perk (thank you!) the additional perks will go out within 60 days of the campaign ending. Stay tuned for announcements and goodies via email! ***

This is my first album. It means absolutely everything to me to feel how much excitement and positive energy there is already surrounding this release! I am humbled and brought to tears almost daily by the early feedback. THANK YOU for your belief in me.

This album is my devotion to healing. Each song contains mantras (a word or sound repeated to aid in concentration or meditation) which come from the rich & deep lineage of yogic meditation.
These melodies have soothed me through turbulent times and inspired courage and softness in my heart during challenging times.

Even though I have been learning the art of music for two decades, it took me several years before I had the courage to begin writing & recording this album a year and a half ago. It is a true expression of my devotion for all that is sacred. I wish for everyone who hears these sonic frequencies to be lifted to a place beyond the mundane, that they bring lightness to your heart & mind, and therefore to all humankind.

*what is purelands?*

‘purelands’ is a name and expression inspired by a buddhist school of thought by a similar name. Though this is not my main path of study, the name resonated. To me, the "purelands" is our natural state of openness, beauty, tranquility and ease, a place deep within each of us... the peaceful and divine place that exists in the natural world, and in each of our hearts and minds. In today's hectic society, it is often easy to forget that we all have access to these places of peace, and music is the best way I know to easily re-set and harmonize in times of strife. In total, these songs, melodies and mantras are written serve as a bridge to the "purelands”, these songs are for you to work to, heal with, cry with, and live by - to experience your own true nature - as a being of purity and love.


*here's what a few early listeners are saying about the album*

"I love the elegant simplicity of the whole album. The instrumentals support your voice, which is simply magical and ethereal. It will become part of my mix for early morning working, it’s on loop and I love it! - Michael M., 49, tech entrepreneur

Just finished listening, it’s otherworldly! - Mariana C., 32, yoga teacher


*about the project*

For this album, I collaborated with world-class artists who shared the same vision: that music carries the essence of pure beauty through sound. Collaborating with multiple grammy nominee, producer and multi-instrumentalist Ben Leinbach in Fairfax, CA was a dream come true - he truly took the vision of my music to new heights, creating a nuanced and beautiful sound woven of organic Eastern and Western instruments, orchestrations and 3 - 4 part vocal harmonies. 
Other renowned and incredible sacred and devotional artists also offered their gifts on this album including: Samatha Keller (vocals), Joss Jaffe (tabla), Manose (Bansuri), Noah Rouse Wilson (dilruba & dulcimer), Gawain Mathews (guitar & mandolin), Shannon Hayden (cello), Charlie Scovill (mixing) & Louis Henry Sarmiento (mastering). Working with these artists was a remarkable and life-changing experience. 

In a world of ‘singles’ this album is a body of work meant to be played in its entirety, on repeat. It’s designed to keep positive energy flowing! In the morning while preparing for your day, while driving, dancing, making love, meditating, or in your yoga classes. 
 

*why indiegogo*

I am doing this campaign for two reasons: 1) to raise money and receive help with the expenses of making the record - and 2) as a new way to release the album! 

As most of you know, as independent artists, most of us don't have the financial backing of a major label - this means that all of the expenses that came with creating and releasing this music came out of my own pocket! I am targeting $11,111 (about half of the cost) to recoup the expenses & to keep making more music! 

Secondly, in the modern world of digital streaming, albums have gone "out of style"... works that are released as albums on streaming platforms tend to get "lost" in the fray of the thousands of albums that get released each day. So! In order to optimize Spotify and Apple Music algorithms, I will be releasing only 1 track every 8 weeks on Spotify (etc)..,this allows the songs a chance to get considered for "playlisting" and the chance to be heard by wider audiences all over the world! 
However, I have chosen to offer the chance for my lucky early fans to support the whole album here via indiegogo!!
 

*here's the plan!*

In order to fund this album, I am offering a campaign first milestone set at $11,111 (this is  only a *portion of what I invested in the entire project) In return I have created some fun perks for you as a thank you for donating to this campaign! Funds raised from album orders will go to *payback* the money I have already spent on recording & production costs, artist fees & travel, mixing & mastering, distribution, marketing & promotion, album photography, music videography, copyright fees, website hosting, indiegogo payment/processing fees and so much more! 

If the campaign does exceed our first milestone of $11,111,  we will continue until the 2nd milestone of $22,222 and keep distributing albums all over the world & making more music <3 

- Also 10% of all proceeds will benefit towards my sister Michelle's World Wide Well memorial initiative to support Yoga, Healing and Meditation training scholarships for aspiring leaders from diverse and low-income backgrounds. 


*how can you help?*

The best way to help is to purchase your copy of the album + a perk by contributing to this campaign! 

I understand that some may not have the financial means to do so, so here are some *creative ways you can help this campaign!

*SPREAD THE WORD!
*Share this campaign on your Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, everywhere! (& tag @purelandsmusic)
*If you are an influencer or community leader, share this music and campaign with your family and friends to your email list, your blog, media contacts, other creators, or with your community.
* Follow me on Instagram (@purelandsmusic) & Facebook (@purelandsmusic) and be sure to tag me when you share! 

* Contact me for collaboration ideas and introductions to musicians, filmmakers, healers and artists in a similar vein. I love co-writing, collaborating and meeting new like-minded people!
*If you have digital marketing, music business, events or project management skills, I am looking for a rockstar team to support me in future musical endeavors. Please reach out!

*and be sure to follow me @purelandsmusic on ig and fb! 

*logistics*
When you order your copy of the album 'into the light' here today, within a few days time, you will receive a unique link to download the entire album via bandcamp. If you have purchased the album with a perk (thank you!) the perks will go out within 60 days of the campaign ending. Stay tuned to announcements via email from the indiegogo campaign and get updated as soon as the album and perks go out!

*& that's all!*
THANK YOU THANK YOU THANK YOU, from the bottom of my heart for supporting my music and my mission of service. Thank you, for the love and support, I truly cannot wait for you to hear these beautiful songs <3 

In love, 
Marcie
story_txt: welcome to the purelands...!My name is Marcie and I am the artist behind this sacred music project. I am a singer, composer, and multi-instrumentalist -- and also a meditator, seeker of truth, and healer.***When you donate or order your copy of the album 'Into the Light' today, within a few days time, you will receive your unique download link(s) via email <3 ******If you have purchased the album with a perk (thank you!) the additional perks will go out within 60 days of the campaign ending. Stay tuned for announcements and goodies via email! ***This is my first album. It means absolutely everything to me to feel how much excitement and positive energy there is already surrounding this release! I am humbled and brought to tears almost daily by the early feedback. THANK YOU for your belief in me.This album is my devotion to healing. Each song contains mantras (a word or sound repeated to aid in concentration or meditation) which come from the rich & deep lineage of yogic meditation.These melodies have soothed me through turbulent times and inspired courage and softness in my heart during challenging times.Even though I have been learning the art of music for two decades, it took me several years before I had the courage to begin writing & recording this album a year and a half ago. It is a true expression of my devotion for all that is sacred. I wish for everyone who hears these sonic frequencies to be lifted to a place beyond the mundane, that they bring lightness to your heart & mind, and therefore to all humankind.*what is purelands?*‘purelands’ is a name and expression inspired by a buddhist school of thought by a similar name. Though this is not my main path of study, the name resonated. To me, the "purelands" is our natural state of openness, beauty, tranquility and ease, a place deep within each of us... the peaceful and divine place that exists in the natural world, and in each of our hearts and minds. In today's hectic society, it is often easy to forget that we all have access to these places of peace, and music is the best way I know to easily re-set and harmonize in times of strife. In total, these songs, melodies and mantras are written serve as a bridge to the "purelands”, these songs are for you to work to, heal with, cry with, and live by - to experience your own true nature - as a being of purity and love.*here's what a few early listeners are saying about the album*"I love the elegant simplicity of the whole album. The instrumentals support your voice, which is simply magical and ethereal. story:
Blind Mark Can Ski!

Skiing has been in Mark's life ever since he was a kid. Growing up working at ski mountains in New Hampshire, Vermont, Oregon and even New Zealand, his love for skiing had grown immensely after visiting and working for so many ski resorts. Three years ago as Mark was making his way up in the ski industry, his skiing got put to a stop when his life had taken a turn where everything became dark. 

Mark and Amanda have organized this campaign to work as a team to getting back to that love of the sport by learning how to be a blind skier and how to guide one as well. On February 8th 2015 we have organized a trip to make this possible! Maine's Adaptive Sports and Recreation have organized the fourth annual New England Blind and Visually Impaired Ski Festival (NEVI fest) at Sugarloaf Mountain in Carrabassett Valley ME. 

This will be a perfect opportunity for not just Mark as a blind skier, but also for Amanda his visual guide on the mountain. This trip will get us trained to be able to ski correctly, safely and to just have fun! We are very interested in meeting many other blind skiers that will also be a part of the NEVI fest to hear their story and understand how they make this possible in blind skiing. 

We are very excited about this festival and are very eager to make this trip a reality!

That's why we need your help!


What We Need 

For this 5 Day NEVI fest:

  • $2,000 for guide and blind skier registration, room & board, and the cost of transportation from southern New Hampshire to Northern Maine! 
  • This will be our second time skiing together, but our first meeting professional blind and visually impaired skiers 
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, it is not going to stop us from going, but it is going to hold us back from how long we can stay, and how much we can learn. We don't want to miss out on any of these opportunities and we want to be able to learn as much as we can at this festival. 

The Impact

We are going to come back from NEVI fest with a new view on life. We will be very inspired by all the guides and blind skiers who gained the courage to make that decision on learning this amazing sport. We find it very impressive when people make this decision to learn this sport and have no fear! 

Risks & Challenges

There may be times where it will get hard. We may get uncomfortable guiding and listening to one another as our instructor trains us to do it the right way. We just need to stay patient and remember how much we are going to benefit from this trip as skiers and a team.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Let people know about our campaign! Share this with the whole world! 
  • We have an Indiegogo share tool called "blindmarkcanski"

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Introducing Neville Jacobs

A tour de force of veteran musicians collaborating to create an original sound that appeals to ears from all of life's callings. 

Fronted by Ivan Neville and Cris Jacobs and backed by one of the most sought-after rhythm dream teams, Tony Hall and Brady Blade, Neville Jacobs is a special collaboration that defies musical boundaries to organically produce some of the most notable new music 2015 has to offer.

Both fate and instincts led  Cris Jacobs to collaborate with Ivan Neville. Aside from Jacobs listening to The Neville Brothers growing up and nearly a decade of causal sit ins with one another, Cris Jacobs and Ivan Neville truly connected at the poker table. Playing cards allowed them to relate on a different level away from the hustle and bustle of working musician life.

In the poker room and off the suggestion from producer and fellow card player, Joe Michaels, Neville and Cris Jacobs hit it off, took the prospect of collaborating to heart, and hit the studio in late 2012.

Neville notes that the end product of Neville Jacobs has no preconceived sound because it limits the possibilities. Both Neville and Jacobs brought songs to the table and more often than not, one would start making noise, another would riff off of it, and songs would be born. Both artists took to the studio with a “let’s see what happens” mentality and thusly created “not a solid project, but a  f*cking great project!” according to Neville.

Prestige and prowess aside, the music of Neville Jacobs speaks for itself. The group is eager to see where the project takes them and to get the music heard by as many people as possible. Neville Jacobs has become a truly organic collaboration with the music taking form out of what feels natural and evolving into an honest, feel-good collection of songs.


Meet The Band

Ivan Neville

Very few people have the musical clout of Ivan Neville. Born into one of the most-recognized and visionary musical families in history, Neville took to keyboards, bass, and guitar at an early age performing with his father (Aaron) and uncles (Art, Charles, and Cyrill) in The Neville Brothers during his teens.

This no-nonsense musical upbringing led him to move to Los Angeles and apply his demanding musical dexterity to writing, performing, and recording music with powerhouses such as Bonnie Raitt, The Rolling Stones, Keith Richards, Rufus, Spin Doctors and countless others. Since 2003, Neville has been entrenched with his musical brainchild, Dumpstaphunk, whose down and dirty New Orleans funk has become a staple in the national festival circuit and features the heavy rhythm section of Tony Hall and Nick Daniels III (basses); his cousin, Ian Neville (guitar), and Alvin Ford Jr. (formerly Nikki Glaspie) on drums. The group has been hailed as “The best funk band from New Orleans right now” by the New York Times.

Cris Jacobs

If there’s one thing to note about Cris Jacobs, it’s that he is not afraid to roll with the punches, see where life leads him and take a gamble on what he believes in. After a successful run with award-winning road warriors, The Bridge, Jacobs decided his next course of action would be to delve into a solo career. Since 2012, he has been on support tours with the likes of Steve Winwood and Sturgill Simpson as well as recorded a full-length album (Songs for Cats and Dogs) with another one on the way.

Tony Hall

When it comes to a bassist who can do it all, Tony Hall is the man for the job.

Hall’s insatiable groove and confidence make bass lines and harmonic interpretation an “automatic” act for him. Rather than succinctly explain what he is doing or trying to break it down and analyze it, Hall just gets down to business and does what comes most naturally to him. It’s this approach that’s landed him work with Dave Matthews, Trey Anastasio, Harry Connick Jr., Jewel, Emmy Lou Harris and beyond.

His album credits are anthologies within themselves and his diverse body of his work is unparalleled.

When it comes to Neville Jacobs, the addition of Hall was another element that was “automatic.” Aside from a long-standing relationship with Neville in Dumpstaphunk and beyond, Hall and drummer, Brady Blade, have a long history and are the epitome of a magnum opus rhythm section.

Brady Blade

Time and time again, you hear the phrase, “you can’t do it all.” In Brady Blade’s case, he shatters that notion and is a jack of all trades as both a performer and in many facets of the music industry.

Blade, alongside Neville Jacobs rhythmic counterpart, Tony Hall, is known for his work with top artists such as Dave Matthews & Friends, Emmy Lou Harris and Jewel.

Blade founded Blade Studios along side partner Scott Crompton and engineer Chris Bell in 2009 and is also the founder of record label, Brick Top Recordings LLC. Much of his work in recent years includes writing and production and he has a natural craft for developing song-writing and producing, which was one of his key roles in Neville Jacobs.

Help us bring this incredible project to the world!

  • Launching a project like this is quite the endeavor. While the tracks are in the can, most are not mixed and mastered. In order to truly ensure that this lands in the hands of the right label and management team, we needed video and promotional work to launch Neville Jacobs into the world with the most momentum possible.
  • Contributors will have to opportunity to obtains CDs, t-shirts, photo books, and other cool swag as well as several "experience"-based perks such as getting a first-hand look at the mixing and mastering process. One lucky funder will get to curate a dream show as the band will perform a private gig and even get to introduce the band before they take the stage!
  • If we don't make our goal, your dollars will still go to finishing the mixing, mastering, and promotion; the budget will just be adjusted down. If we bust over, we just have more time perfecting the mix!

The Impact

By acting as a contributor to this project, you are directly supporting bringing music created by 4 of the most gargantuan players in today's music scene to life.

Whether you have been following Ivan Neville for the better part of 2 decades, were moved by heartfelt songs written by Cris Jacobs, or just now found out Tony Hall and Brady Blade were the slamming rhythm section on one of your favorite albums, there is something for everyone in Neville Jacobs.

The musical and professional standards of this project are set at the highest echelon and, in order to make sure this process is seen though 110%, we will need the help of our friends, family, and fans to chip in whatever they can to be present in this process. This music will not let you down and the band holds their fans and supporters in the highest regard and makes this music for YOU!

Risks & Challenges

The general public often is often unaware of the time, energy and expenses that go into making a high-quality album. You need top-notch engineers, producers, management, labels, photographers/videographers, publicists, etc to utilize all resources and to make sure the project is the best-oiled machine on the market!

Here are an example of some of the expenses:

  • $10,000 - Mixing with Chris Bell (Destiny's Child, The Eagles)
  • $2,000 - Mastering By Grammy-winning engineer David Glasser (Grateful Dead, Hot Tuna, Leftover Salmon)
  • $10,000 - Two video shoots ($5,000 each)
  • $5,000 - Tour promotion.

It is also time-consuming and difficult to coordinate the schedules of 4 full-time, working musicians who do nothing but eat, sleep, write, create, and breathe music, so the limited time Neville Jacobs spends together needs to be spent wisely.

Other Ways You Can Help

We know times can be tough and money can be tight, so even if you can't chip in $5, please share this campaign on all social media outlets and help us spread the word!

  • Please  use the Indiegogo share tools! They make it easy for you to help tell the world!

And that's all there is to it. Thanx so much from Ivan, Cris Tony, Brady and Joe
